Title: Announcing EpiServer CMS in Azure Marketplace
Summary: EpiServer CMS, a platform to build web content management solutions, is now available in the Azure Marketplace. Episerver CMS is a great tool to quickly build out digital experiences for your customers and gather measurable insights to drive business decisions.
Content:
EpiServer CMS is a platform to build web content management solutions. We’re excited to announce that it is now available in the Azure Marketplace. This solution provides the best of both worlds:

  • With EpiServer you can quickly build out modern, innovative solutions for your customers
  • With Azure you get the flexibility to  easily manage your infrastructure and auto-scale during peak periods (both are essential for digital marketing solutions)

With the free 30-day evaluation of the application, you can try before you buy. However, please note that you will be charged for the Azure resources consumed by the application in your Azure subscription during the evaluation period.

To learn more about how to create an EpiServer CMS application, check out this recent Azure App Service Team blog post.
